dcterms:description: A new benchmark for quantifying hallucinations in an open-vocabulary setting, leveraging generative foundation models to evaluate open-vocabulary caption hallucinations.
dcterms:title: OpenCHAIR

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images with object annotations, widely used for image captioning and object detection tasks.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:creator: Anna Rohrbach
Lisa Anne Hendricks
Kaylee Burns

dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating object hallucinations in image captioning, focusing on closed-vocabulary object sets.
dcterms:title: CHAIR

dcterms:creator: Peter Young
Alice Lai
Micah Hodosh
Julia Hockenmaier
dcterms:description: A dataset containing image descriptions and their corresponding visual denotations, used for semantic inference over event descriptions.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K
